title: Pashinyan says people in Armenia live better than in 2018 – they disagree
description:
Pashinyan says people are living better

“Today, people in Armenia live approximately 50% better than they did in 2018, even taking inflation into account,” Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan stated during a discussion of last year’s state budget execution report.

title: Armenian Unemployment Up To 14% Despite GDP Growth
description:
“In 2024, the unemployment rate in Armenia increased by 1.5 percentage points compared to the previous year, reaching 13.9 percent,” he told lawmakers during a meeting that discussed the Armenian government’s execution of the 2024 state budget.
